text: Moulin Rouge is a 1952 British drama movie directed by John Huston and based on the 1950 novel of the same name by Pierre La Mure. It stars Zsa Zsa Gabor, Jos√© Ferrer, Suzanne Flon, Katherine Kath, Peter Cushing, Christopher Lee, Michael Balfour and was distributed by United Artists. It was nominated for 7 Oscars and won 2 Academy Awards in 1953. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1952 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies set in the 1890s Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Huston
title: Moulin Rouge (1952 movie)
